title: Resolved OpenAI API Key Issue and Timeout Errors
description: We have resolved the OpenAI API key issue and timeout errors in the Horizon Project. This update ensures a stable connection with the AI for generating suggestions. The system is now more robust and reliable, reducing potential disruptions.

chats.message: Hello! How can I help you today?
I'd like to know more about the fix for the OpenAI Key issue.
We updated the environment variables and reconfigured the request timeouts...

title: Identified and Resolved API Request Failure in Horizon Project
description: We've identified and resolved the API request failure in the Horizon notification system. The root cause was an authentication mismatch in the request body. The fix ensures successful notifications for project updates and user mentions.

chats.message: Hello! I'm your Horizon assistant. How can I help?
What was the root cause of the API request failure?
The root cause was an authentication mismatch in the request body...

title: Enhance Error Handling in Big Brain API
description: We improved error handling for the initial_instruction parameter. If initial_instruction is not a string, the system now throws an error and logs a warning to the console.

chats.message: Hi! Letâ€™s talk about error handling improvements.
How did you implement the new validation?
We added a check to ensure initial_instruction is a string. If not, we throw an error.
